I currently  provide internal  sales supp ort to new and existing customers who  require fluid 
control technologies . This includes  providing solutions for the process contr ol and 
measurement in the areas of : Pressure, Flow , Level  & Temperature , HVAC/R , Tubes and 
Fittings and Custom  Solu tions . I manage 20+ customer accounts focused around  the 
sectors  of Oil & Gas , Clean  Energy, New /High -Tech Technologies,  and Cryogenics . 
Key  Achievements : 
• Buil t rappor t with , and provided solutions to, high potential growth accounts 
in the new -tech  space ; clients  I now manage and liaise  with on a regular  basis . 
• Proactively  led and secured  the compan y’s only 6-figure engineering project 
for the year , in my first year  – we specifically secured an or der for  several  LH2 
bellow -sealed valves for a leading client in the autom otive industry ; Pioneers 
and world leaders in luxury  vehicle manufacturing . 
• Secured 300 + general sales opportunities  in the last year for new and existing 
customers . 
• Meets and exceed s company KPI s related to forecast  figures  and growth 
targe ts. 
 
Daily Responsibilities : 
• Provid e Internal  Tech nical and Commercial  Support to  New and E xisting  
Customers over the phone , via email and over Microsoft Teams . 
• Secur e business with competitive ac counts through a combination of 
engineering competence , sales acumen  and strategic pr icing  structure s. 
• Present  general  and  technical  quo tations  for products  from 50 + manufacturers  
of valves and process instrumentation . 
• Build relationships with supplier s, continuously develop ing knowledge and 
stay ing up to date  with the ir product range  and offerings . 
• Manage account records /information  on Microsoft  CRM  and check stock of 
product and provide order updates to customers  using Sage  Software .
